name: CubeRun: Runner
description:
Yo What's up Gamerzzz!!!!!

Here I am presenting my first Game that I had created with the help of Brackeys Tutorial.

It is a very simple Game in which the player have to reach to the finish line without getting touch to any other cubes.

Controls :-

  • A = Left
  • D = Right

System Requirements :-

  • Operating System : Windows
  • RAM : 3 GB [recommended]
  • Graphics Memory : 2 GB
  • Storage : 100 MB
